revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - I agree with all the changes proposed, also line 12, <ἥ> τʼ ἔφοδος, where an η instead of τ does not seem possible to me (η usually has the second leg curved). In line 6 a space is to be inserted after γίτονες, in line 19 a full stop at the end of the text.

Vote - AcceptText - lin1 ἐποκίο̣υ̣ not easy but defensible || lin12 not easy to read tau (τεφοδος), and the mistake would be gross; ἡ ἔφοδος of ed. pr. is better (pap. doesn't have ἥ τε ἔφοδος, suggested in BL 1.172) => <:ἡ ἔφοδος|ed|ἥ τε ἔφοδος=BL 1.172:> ?
Submit - Integration of further BL correction, additional minor corrections and regularizations.

Commit - I've integrated further BL 1 corrections that hadn't been included: line 6 ed. pr. ἐμφόδου (l. ἀμφόδου), ἀμφόδου=BL 1.172, Φρουρίου with a capital phi. In line 15 ed. pr. ἐξεδόμεν (l. ἐξεδόμην), ἐξεδόμην=BL 1.173. Additional corrections: in line 1, the papyrus seems to read ἐποκίο̣υ̣ (left half of the upsilon preserved, its shape as seen throughout the text); in line 6 I've regularized the name Ἀσυγκρητίου to Ἀσυγκριτίου; in line 9 I've regularized κυρία to κυριεία (the term for "proprietorship"). In line 12 the scribe appears to have omitted the article ἡ of the formula, and wrote τεφοδος = τ’ ἔφοδος.
